photos.controllers

Class PhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • photos.controllers.PhotoController

  • public class PhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
    Our controller class for the photo view scene.

      PhotoController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTag()
      Adds a selected tag to this photo.
      void back()
      Closes this stage.
      void clear()
      Removes this scene from Utility.openedPhotoWindows.
      void close()
      Closes this window.
      void deleteTag()
      Deletes a selected tag from this photo.
      void initialize()
      The method to initialize this scene.
      void next()
      Views the next photo in the album.
      void prev()
      Views the previous photo in the album.
      void setGlobalTags()
      Sets the tags for this user on initialization.
      void update()
      Updates the UI depending on how many photos exist in the album.
      void updateGlobalTags()
      Updates the list of all tags for this user.
      void updateTags()
      Updates the UI depending on the state of the program.
      void updateTextFields()
      Updates the UI depending on the state of the program.

          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Throws:
